alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 4:11PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Flagler, eastern St. Johns and southeastern Duval Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 411 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near San Pablo to Palm Coast. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Saint Augustine, Ponte Vedra Beach, Neptune Beach, Saint Augustine Beach, Marineland, Sawgrass, Nocatee, Vilano Beach and Craig Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
